cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 8th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Superior Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Single Room With Windows, Shared Bathrooms

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Double Bed, Ensuite Bathroom, Air Conditioning, Bar Fridge, TV

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
